pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create HIDECAN Plots for Visualising Genome-Wide Association Studies and Differential Expression Results // Generates HIDECAN plots that summarise and combine the results of genome- wide association studies (GWAS) and transcriptomics differential expression analyses (DE), along with manually curated candidate genes of interest. The HIDECAN plot is presented in Angelin-Bonnet et al. (2023) (currently in review).
